main_definition: Operated or performed by mechanical or electronic systems without human intervention.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving automatic operation or control, typically through machinery or computer programming.
meanings_and_examples.example: The assembly line in the factory was highly automated, with robots performing most of the tasks.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Processing information using a system that operates automatically without human input.
meanings_and_examples.example: Automated teller machines (ATMs) allow customers to perform financial transactions without cashiers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to or involving the use of technology for self-service and reducing human labor.
meanings_and_examples.example: Online shopping websites often have automated checkout systems, which streamlines the purchasing process for customers.
